room_title: Escape room "Wizard's Tower" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: What an incredible experience! The guys running this escape room are so friendly and fun! You can really tell they put a lot of thought into making the escape room fun and memorable. Thanks Alex for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Wizard's Tower" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: My 13-year-old son and I did a new Wizard's room, and we loved it! It's not the hardest room but it's not the easiest either. We are experienced at doing escape rooms and we were able to complete the room in record time with a few hints. I think this is a perfect room for kids. I look forward to their next one.

room_title: Escape room "Wizard's Tower" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This was my first escape room ever, and I loved it so much! My best friends and I were able to escape the Wizard's Tower room with some hints from the friendly staff. Woohoo! Great work on this room! I really felt like I was in another world. We will definitely be coming back and will be spreading the word! Thank you for an amazing time!
